title: Episode 205: The Liberty Island Treasure
description:
The beautiful green goddess that guards the shores of the Big Apple has been a symbol of freedom and a beloved icon since her debut. But the island she stands on wasn’t always fit for a pedestal. Legend has it, she’s hiding a treasure worth millions beneath her foundation, leading pirates, soldiers, treasure hunters, and even ghosts to crowd her shores.
Recorded live at City Winery in NYC
